title: His and Her Circumstances
resume: In His and Her Circumstances, like a drug, Yukino Miyazawa was  addicted to admiration and praise from those around her. She worked hard  to become the perfect student, the perfect girl. But that was before…  him. Souichirou Arima. The instant she met him, she hated him. Without  even trying, he snatched the very glory from her hands by easily acing  the high school entrance exam that should have made her the class  representative. To take back what is rightfully hers, Yukino is putting  all her efforts into plotting her revenge – but was love part of the  plan?
